item.title: VTRS
item.description: score:-49 Chances: Viatris Inc. (VTRS) has been gaining attention as a pharmaceutical stock that may be undervalued. The company recently received tentative approval from the FDA for a pediatric HIV regimen, which could open new revenue streams. Viatris reported strong Q2 2023 earnings with growth in its generics business, indicating positive performance.
